DOC.detailed_description: All patient definite ALS diagnosis , age > 18 year , refer ALS outpatient clinic Fondazione Salvatore Maugeri Institute Lumezzane ( Brescia ) Istituto Don Gnocchi Onlus ( Milano ) , Italy , respiratory functional assessment purpose early initiation NIV consider . Patients clinically stable condition without chest infection previous 3 month consider eligible study . Between March 2011 March 2014 , outpatient visit , patient randomize 1:1 two group NIV initiation : outpatient vs. inpatient protocol . In group diurnal NIV initiation trial perform use pressure-support ventilator spontaneous/timed mode preset tidal volume ( 300 ml/kg ) fix back-up respiratory rate ( 12 breaths/min ) . The trial include : choice mask , set ventilator pressure , least 2 hour NIV supervision . Then , patient underwent nighttime NIV initiation trial maximum 20 night accord outpatient vs. inpatient protocol . NIV trial stop : 1 ) patient use NIV > 4 hours/night 3 consecutive night , 2 ) patient caregiver able manage ventilator , 3 ) patient fail 10 consecutive educational session . At enrollment ( T0 ) , end NIV initiation trial ( T1 ) 3 month end trial ( T2 ) respiratory function test , blood gas analysis , sleep study perform . At T1 investigator assess NIV acceptance ( minimum 3 consecutive day > 4 h/night ) , dyspnea symptom VAS ( day/night ) , staff patient ' satisfaction . At T2 : NIV adherence ( > 120 h/month ) patient ' satisfaction .
